nodes.label: * * ctx . accounts . reward_acc . lamports . borrow_mut () = ctx . accounts . reward_acc . lamports () . saturating_sub (amount) ;
* * ctx . accounts . recipient . lamports . borrow_mut () = ctx . accounts . recipient . lamports () . saturating_add (amount) ;
let log = & mut ctx . accounts . audit_log ;
log . entries . push ((ctx . accounts . admin . key () , amount)) ;
